hero.button: Get My Ticket to the Higher Purpose Tour

about.text1: I'd say the main thing I learned is just being present and being in the moment, to really not caring, just being self amused. It's part of being purposeful, there's other things that I'm excited about, and this is just one of those aspects.
about.text2: I'm excited to just apply being in the present and be this new age like there's a huge movement going on. I can feel it. I'm just excited to be a part of it and yeah I love Owen, he's awesome.

features.text1: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text
features.text2: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.
features.feature1: Will you continue to let procrastination take over?
features.feature2: Allow a lack of confidence riddle you with anxiety for the rest of your life?
features.feature3: Continue to follow advice that hasn't worked?
features.feature4: Continue to blame others for your lack of success?
features.text3: If you've had ENOUGH and are ready to BREAK FREE from Group Think and Social Conditioning that keeps you in the Self Actualization Rat Race…
features.text4: Grab Your FREE Ticket to the Higher Purpose Tour Before Our Limited Seating Books Out!
features.higherPurposeText: The Higher Purpose Tour has a $25 deposit that's refunded when you attend, in an effort to book the most comfortable sized room for everyone. Email {{email}} (if you attended) to receive your refund, or simply donate it if you enjoyed the talk!
features.featuresImageHeadline: Are you as far in life as you thought you'd be by now?
features.featuresImageText1: You're not alone. We've been taught to listen to what our teachers, our government and even our parents tell us to do to get ahead in life…
features.featuresImageText2: But WHY hasn't it worked then?
features.featuresImageText3: We continue to follow advice from people and places that mean well, but in no shape or form have bred the type of person everyone hopes, or thinks should become
features.featuresImageText4: Instead of waiting around for the right thing to come along, or for the answer to just present itself…
features.featuresImageText5: You gotta think outside the massive box you've been kept in your whole life.
features.featuresImageFeature1: Get enough clarity and awareness to tell the difference between the truth and what they want you to believe
features.featuresImageFeature2: Realize your own (very often) self-imposed limitations and hindering self-dialogue
features.featuresImageFeature3: Get the tools and the knowledge to start the fire within ourselves that you've been taught to keep inside

opportunity.text5: And today, you have the opportunity to have this life-changing experience in a city near you in the US and select city around the world with our elite level Coaches
opportunity.cardText:
COME EXPERIENCE THE LIFE-DEFINING,
PERSONAL TRANSFORMATION
opportunity.cardButton: Get My Ticket to the Higher Purpose Tour
opportunity.text6:
For over 20 years, we've changed the lives of hundreds of thousands of people worldwide.
We're considered to be the industry's best for a reason.
opportunity.text7:
The transformations and results we produce from our events and programs are second to none,
and have turned the lives of millions of people around; from all walks of life.
opportunity.text8:
We've helped people go from shy, timid, self doubting and complete followers… into confident,
grounded leaders who today enjoy the life deep down they set out to live.
